title: Latest Dialysis News: Insights from 2019 to 2021
text: Peritoneal dialysis and its complications Peritoneal Dialysis and Its Associated Complications November 22, 2021 Worldwide, the number of patients suffering from chronic kidney disease (CKD) or loss of kidney function is gradually increasing. Due to this trend, the number of people who need renal replacement therapy is also on the rise. Read More
